response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. Given its significance, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exceptional deal considering its true worth of $1,200,000. We trust that this offer will allow you to secure this masterpiece at a highly favorable rate. Kindly let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
